title: Beach Buggy Racing
summary:
Drive into an action-packed, surprise-filled world of off-road kart racing mayhem. Race against a field of rival drivers, each with unique personalities and special abilities. Build a collection of crazy powerups, like Dodgeball Frenzy, Fireball, and Oil Slick. Unlock and upgrade a variety of cars, from dune buggies to monster trucks. Test your skills in 6 different game modes on 15 imaginative 3D race tracks, against a pack of tropical-loving rivals with a serious case of road rage!

This is the official sequel Beach Buggy Blitz, the free driving game with over 30 Million players worldwide. Fast, furious, fun and FREE, Beach Buggy Racing is a kart-racing island adventure for all ages.


â€¢ â€¢ GAME FEATURES

EXCITING KART-RACING ACTION
Utilize your driving skills and a collection of creative powerups to fight your way to the finish line. Itâ€™s not just a great looking 3D racing game, itâ€™s an epic battle with spectacular physics-based gameplay!

COOL CARS TO CUSTOMIZE
Use your winnings to collect and upgrade a garage full of unique cars, from monster trucks to muscle cars to lunar rovers!

TONS OF AMAZING POWERUPS
Beach Buggy Racing crushes other kart racers with over 25 totally unique Powerups ... and more Powerups are coming!

15 SPECTACULAR RACE TRACKS
Explore dinosaur-infested jungles, lava-spewing volcanoes, beautiful beaches, and mysterious swamps. Each unique race track is packed with hidden shortcuts and surprises.

COLLECT A TEAM OF RACERS
Recruit a team of drivers to play with, each with a unique special power like teleportation, flaming fire tracks, and confusion spells.

SPLIT SCREEN MULTIPLAYER
Race shoulder-to-shoulder with up to 4 friends on Android TV, or a TV-connected phone or tablet. (Requires In-App Purchase)

GOOGLE PLAY GAME SERVICES
Compete with your friends on Leaderboards, earn Achievements, back up your game to the cloud, and keep multiple devices in sync with your Google account.

PLAY THE WAY YOU WANT
Seamlessly switch between tilt steering, touch-screen, and USB/Bluetooth gamepad. Customize the 3D graphics settings to optimize your play experience.


â€¢ â€¢ CUSTOMER SUPPORT

If you encounter a problem running the game, please email us at support@vectorunit.com. Be sure to include the device you're using, Android OS version, and a detailed description of your problem.

We GUARANTEE if we can't fix a purchasing problem we'll give you a refund. But we can't help you if you just leave your problem in a review.

For fast support on most common issues please visit:
www.vectorunit.com/support


â€¢ â€¢ MORE INFORMATION â€¢ â€¢

Be the first to hear about updates, download custom images, and interact with the developers!

Like us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/VectorUnit
Follow us on Twitter @vectorunit.
Visit our web page at www.vectorunit.com

title: School Party Craft
summary:
Dear players, our game is under active development! We ask you to write your wishes and suggestions, what you would like to see in the next update.

School Party is a cubic style life simulator for schoolchildren and teenagers.
You have a big city at your disposal, in which there are many cute girls and nice boys.
You not only have to hang out and do shopping, but also buy mansions, meet cool characters and even ride the coolest cars!
In this city, your possibilities know no boundaries: building houses, buying blocks, furniture and doors is just the beginning of a big adventure.
Be trendy and stylish - dress up, walk around town, swim in the pool, go to the movies and dance in the crazy disco!

Crafting and building:
Many beautiful mansions with large plots where you can demolish the purchased house and build the cottage of your dreams.
A large collection of various blocks for construction and decoration.
Hundreds of types of furniture for every taste: chairs, tables, sofas and beds, wardrobes and more.
Doors, houseplants and chandeliers will complete the design of your home.

Relationship between players:
Don't worry, you are not alone in the city.
There are thousands of people in the city with whom you can communicate, be friends, walk together, visit a restaurant and a park, ride supercars together and hang out in a nightclub.
If you like the character, add him to the phone book and communicate with him via SMS at any time.

Paintball:
Large selection of paintball weapons:
Miniguns, Pistols, Assault Rifles and exclusive Dinogun, Bazooka-Shark and more.
All this shoots colored bullets with paints.
Shoot the hooligans who took your coins and they will return them to you.

Interesting places:
- Market (furniture, blocks, doors, skins and paintball guns)
- Disco (order music from DJs and dance with your friends)
- Large park
- Beach and sea with sun loungers
- Restaurant and cinema
- School and bank
- Car dealership and gas station
- City pool

Features of the game:
- Driving cars and tuning
- Sport: motorcycles, bicycles, scooters and skateboards
- Mini-games (barman in the disco (2nd floor), barman in the restaurant (1st floor), game of smiles)
- Chests with coins and many bonuses
- Ship cruise and airplane flight
- Swimming (on the beach and in the pools)
- Beautiful character animation
- First and Third person camera
- Interactive with furniture (sit, sleep etc)
- Change of weather and time of day
- Convenient and intuitive controls
- Optimization for weak devices (from 1 GB of RAM)
- Customization of gameplay and buttons to your liking

Create your pixel interior in the world of fairy tales and fantasy.
Enjoy your game.

title: Angry Birds 2
summary:
Join hundreds of millions of players for FREE and start the fun slingshot adventure now! Team up with your friends, climb the leaderboards, gather in clans, collect hats, take on challenges, and play fun events in all-new game modes. Evolve your team and show your skills in this exciting Angry Birds game !

Get to know all of the iconic Angry Birds characters and experience the fun gameplay that has captured the hearts of millions of players.

Features:

â— DAILY CHALLENGES. Have a minute? Complete a daily challenge and earn some quick rewards.
â— LEVEL UP your characters with feathers and up their scoring power. Build the ultimate flock!
â— JOIN A CLAN to take down the pigs with friends and players around the world.
â— COMPETE in the ARENA. Compete with other players for some friendly bird flinging fun and prove who is the best.
â— COLLECT SILLY HATS. Collect hats with different fun themes to level up your flockâ€™s fashion game and take part in special events.
â— IMPRESS THE MIGHTY EAGLE in special challenges in Mighty Eagleâ€™s Bootcamp and earn coins to use in his exclusive shop.
â— LOTS OF LEVELS. Play hundreds of levels with more added in regular updates and limited time events.
â— LEADERBOARDS. Compete with your friends and other players and prove who is the best on the global leaderboards.
â— CHOOSE YOUR BIRD. Choose which bird to put in the slingshot and defeat the pigs with strategy!
â— MULTI-STAGE LEVELS. Play fun, challenging levels with multiple stages â€“ just watch out for Boss Pigs!
â— FREE to download! --- Angry Birds 2 is completely free to play. Although Angry Birds 2 can be downloaded for free, there are optional in-app purchases available.


---
When playing this game, Rovio will offset the carbon footprint caused by the deviceâ€™s energy consumption.

This game may include:
- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.
- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse to any web page.
- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from third parties.

Although some features are available offline, this game may require internet connectivity for certain features. Normal data transfer charges apply. Note: When the game is played for the first time, there is a one-time download of additional content that cannot be completed while offline.

We may update the game periodically, for example to add new features or content or to fix bugs or other technical issues. Please note that the game may not function properly if you do not have the newest version installed. If you have not installed the latest update, Rovio will not be responsible for the game failing to function as expected.

title: Super Bear Adventure
summary:
Travel through the kingdom and its different regions in this 3D adventure inspired by late 90s games. Explore each region freely, uncover their secrets, and save your bear friends! This realm was once a peaceful place, until the bees started producing purple honey, a strange substance that turns anyone who eats it into a mindless foe. You will play as Baaren, a courageous bear set on a quest to free the kingdom from this menace of unknown origin.

Along the way, you will find loads of collectibles, items to customize your character, exciting places to explore, speedy vehicles to drive, daily challenges to test your skills, and fun mini-games to play. Using Baarenâ€™s straightforward yet complete set of moves, you will be able to climb steep mountains, fight dangerous enemies, and explore this world packed with surprises.

title: Drive Zone: Car Simulator Game
summary:
Drive Zone Online is a car driving simulator. Burn your tires on the asphalt and explore "Grand Car Parking City" and the world around it. You can participate in street racing, drift racing, drag racing or invite a friend and drive around the city together.

Endless open world
-Resort coastline measuring 20x20km
-City, desert airfield, racing track, highway, beach area, port and many other areas
-Up to 32 players with you online
-Tens of kilometers of roads and hundreds of hidden bonuses on the map

Auto and tuning
-50+ cars including vintage cars, supercars, suvs, hypercars
-30+ body kits for each car. Rims, bumpers, spoilers, bodykits, liveries.
-Free vinyl editor with which you can draw your personal skin of any complexity
-Suspension and camber adjustments to improve vehicle handling and appearance
-The engine and gearbox are pumped, which will help to defeat your rivals
-Each car has a well-designed interior and engine, all doors, hood and trunk open!

Great graphics
-Realistic DZO graphics create the coolest picture in a mobile phone game
-Detailed interior of the car allows you to play in the first person with impressive emotions
-High performance allows you to play not only on powerful devices
-Advanced graphics settings will allow you to choose everything you need

Gameplay
No boundaries. Earn money for new cars not only by participating in races, but also by simply performing stunts and gaining drift points or by selling your cars and skins to other players on the market like a real outbid.

-DRIFT mode - you and other players will compete for the most drift points
-CAR RACE mode - the winner will be the one who crosses the finish line first, avoiding a severe accident
-SKILL TEST mode - race around insane ski jump karts
-Driving school, where you will be taught to drive a car with dignity, will let you test many cars and after passing will be rewarded with special awards.
-Auto market - trade with other players and wager RP to earn or get rare and valuable items
-Hundreds of tasks, quests and achievements with their own rewards

WE DEVELOP THE GAME TOGETHER
Follow the news and participate in regular contests and polls that are held on social networks:

discord.gg/aR3nyK3VCE
youtube.com/@DriveZoneOnline
instagram.com/drivezone_online
t.me/drivezoneofficial
facebook.com/drivezoneonline/
tiktok.com/@drivezoneonline

Take part and help with your ideas in the development of the project by answering, for example, the following questions:
Does the game need city traffic or police?
Do you like drifting and driving physics?

What are you waiting for, Driver.. Welcome to the family, your new friends in multiplayer are waiting for you. Start your car and go beyond the horizon of the Drive Zone Online!

title: Traffic Rider
summary:
Another masterpiece from the creators of Traffic Racer. This time, you are behind the wheels of a motorbike in a much more detailed gaming experience, but also retaining the old school fun and simplicity.

Traffic Rider takes the endless racing genre to a whole new level by adding a full career mode, first person view perspective, better graphics and real life recorded bike sounds. The essence of smooth arcade racing is still there but in the shell of the next generation. Ride your bike in the endless highway roads overtaking the traffic, upgrade and buy new bikes to beat the missions in career mode.

Now it is time to hit the roads with a motorcycle!

FEATURES
- First person camera view
- 34 motorbikes to choose from
- Real motor sounds recorded from real bikes
- Detailed environments with day and night variations
- Career mode with 90+ missions
- Online leaderboards and 30+ achievements
- Support for 19 languages

TIPS
- The faster you ride, the more scores you get
- When driving over 100 kmh, overtake traffic cars closely to get bonus scores and cash
- Driving in opposite direction in two-way gives extra score and cash
- Do wheelies to get extra score and cash

FOLLOW US
* http://facebook.com/trafficridergame
* http://twitter.com/traffic_rider

*** No Timers, No Fuel *** Just pure endless fun!

Traffic Rider will be updated regularly with your suggestions. Don't forget to leave a review with your feedback.

title: Extreme Car Driving Simulator
summary:
Extreme Car Driving Simulator is the open world car simulator since 2014, thanks to its advanced real physics engine
Ever wanted to try a sports car simulator? Now you can drive, drift and feel a racing sports car!
Be a furious racer on a whole city for you. No need to brake because of traffic or racing other rival vehicles, so you can perform illegal stunt actions and run full speed without the police chasing you!

Drifting fast and doing burnouts had never been so fun! Burn the asphalt of this open world city!

Game Features

Mini game checkpoint mode
Drive with traffic
Full real HUD including revs, gear and speed
ABS, TC and ESP simulation. You can also turn them off!
Explore a detailed open world environment
Realistic car damage. Crash your car!
Accurate physics
Control your car with a steering wheel, accelerometer or arrows
Several different cameras
Gamepad support

summary:
Mini Militia - Doodle Army 2 is all about intense multiplayer combat!
Battle with up to 6 players online in this 2D fun cartoon themed cross between Soldat and Halo, inspired on the original stickman shooter Doodle Army.

.Online multiplayer with up to 6 players
.Intuitive dual stick shooting controls with jetpack flight
.Over 20 maps to explore
.Wide range of modern and futuristic weapon types
.Offline Survival mode

This game includes optional in-game purchases (includes random items).

title: Beach Buggy Racing 2
summary:
Join the Beach Buggy Racing League and compete against drivers and cars from around the world. Race through Egyptian pyramids, dragon-infested castles, pirate ship wrecks, and experimental alien bio-labs. Collect and upgrade an arsenal of fun and wacky Powerups. Recruit new drivers, assemble a garage full of cars and race your way to the top of the League.

The first Beach Buggy Racing introduced over 300 million international mobile players to console-style kart-racing with a playful offroad twist. With BBR2, we've upped the ante with a ton of new content, upgradeable Powerups, new game modes...and for the first time you can compete against other players in online competitions and tournaments!

ğŸğŸš¦ SPECTACULAR KART RACING ACTION

Beach Buggy Racing is a fully 3D off-road kart racing game with amazing physics, detailed cars and characters, and spectacular weapons, powered by Vector Engine and NVIDIA's PhysX. It's like a console game in the palm of your hand!

ğŸŒ€ğŸš€ UPGRADE YOUR POWERUPS

With over 45 Powerups to discover and upgrade, BBR2 adds a layer of strategic depth to the classic kart racing formula. Create your own custom Powerup deck with out-of-this-world abilities like "Chain Lightning", "Donut Tires", "Boost Juice" and "Killer Bees".

ğŸ¤–ğŸ¤´ BUILD YOUR TEAM

Build your reputation to recruit new racers, each with their own unique special ability. Four new drivers -- Mikka, Beat Bot, Commander Nova and Clutch -- join Rez, McSkelly, Roxie and the rest of the BBR crew in the battle for kart racing supremacy.

ğŸš—ğŸï¸ COLLECT OVER 55 CARS

Collect a garage full of beach buggies, monster trucks, muscle cars, classic pickups and formula supercars. All the Beach Buggy classic cars return -- plus dozens of new cars to discover!

ğŸ†ğŸŒ PLAY AGAINST THE WORLD

Test your skills against other players from around the world. Race against player avatars in daily races. Compete in live tournaments and special events to win exclusive in-game prizes.

ğŸ¨â˜ ï¸ CUSTOMIZE YOUR RIDE

Win exotic metallic, rainbow and matte paints. Collect decal sets with tiger stripes, polka dots, and skulls. Customize your car exactly the way you like.

ğŸ•¹ï¸ğŸ² AWESOME NEW GAME MODES

Edge-of-your-seat racing with 6 drivers. Daily drift and obstacle course challenges. One on one driver races. Weekly tournaments. Car challenges. So many ways to play!

title: Score! Hero
summary:
Join millions. Achieve Football glory! Be a Hero at the world's game!

Ever dreamed of being a global soccer superstar? Prefer an easy to play puzzle-inspired game that has been enjoyed by millions? A football game that offers realistic 3D action with a chance to sign for your favourite football team â€“ or play for your country!?

We know you have the talent, precision and skill. You want to compare yourself with the best. So play on - for free!

Simple to play, a challenge to master, inspire your Hero through a legion of thrilling moments now fully revamped and enhanced from the original of this much loved soccer game released in 2015.

Conjure up that magic pass, unlock defences then curl in that perfect shot to score and celebrate! Triumph with trophies you progress through your career and earn great prizes. Take on hundreds of levels of engaging gameplay challenges for your Hero to conquer.

Customise your Hero with great-looking kit too. Look the part with an array of cool items to choose from.

From the team at First Touch Games, award winning makers of other smash hit mobile soccer games including Dream League Soccer, Score! Hero continues our tradition of showcasing incredible graphics, glorious animations, and ultra-realistic gameplay.

FEATURES
â€¢ DREAM BIG as you SCORE amazing goals, PICK out that killer pass and CURL your shots into the top corner!
â€¢ SUPER EASY pickup and go gameplay
â€¢ PROGRESS through HUNDREDS & hundreds of levels, each one an individually crafted soccer scenario to master!
â€¢ LEVEL UP your hero, play unique EVENTS & complete DAILY objectives!
â€¢ ENHANCED 3D graphics, ENRICHED motion-captured animations. ADVANCED AI & physics giving you the complete immersive football experience.
â€¢ HAND-PICK your Hero's unique look and appearance

IMPORTANT
â€¢ This game is free to play, but additional content and in-game items may be purchased for real money. To disable In-App Purchases, go to Play Store/Settings/Authentication.
â€¢ This app contains third party advertising.

title: Subway Princess Runner
summary:
Subway Princess Runner is an endless running game. Rush as fast as you can dodge the oncoming trains, You can choose your favorite character to use the skateboard to surf in the subway. Help Lucy and Kevin escape the police and earn high scores, what are you waiting for? Run now!!!

[FEATURES]:
- Subway theme game
- Influent screen touch
- Double tap for skateboard, feeling the special running
- Challenge the highest score with world players
- The higher the level,the higher the score
- Grind trains with your cool crew
- Colorful and vivid HD graphics
- Upgrade all the properties to get endless power

[HOW TO PLAY]:
- Jump, slide to avoid obstacle
- Smooth touch your phone
- Run as far as possible to pick up coins and diamonds
- Easy to run left or right
- Use prop of scores, coins
- Upgrade your level by notching tasks
- Choose your liked characters

[EVENTS]:
- Daily Highscore, Challenge high scores to enter the rankings!
- Crazy Runner, Challenge levels, accumulate points and win special characters!
- Team Battle, Unlock more characters and get more exchange coins!

Run as far as you can, Join the most daring chase!

FOLLOW US
If you have any questions, please contact our Facebook Homepage: https://www.facebook.com/SubwayPrincessRunner

title: Mob Control
summary:
ğŸŒŸ Lead, Multiply, and Conquer! Mob Control delivers thrilling tower defense action where you grow your mob, deploy powerful champions, and crush enemy bases. Unlock collectible cards, conquer exciting modes, and climb the Champions League. Face new challenges, earn rewards, and discover fresh content as you rise to tower defense supremacy!

ğŸ° Unleash Your Inner Commander in Mob Control: The Ultimate Tower Defense Clash!

ğŸ† Defend, Conquer, and Rise to Victory in this Epic Tower Defense Showdown!

Are you ready to become the ultimate champion in the world of tower defense battles? Mob Control brings you an unparalleled strategy and action-packed experience that will test your skills, wit, and tactical prowess. With oddly satisfying gameplay and a wide array of features, Mob Control is your gateway to tower defense supremacy.

Oddly Satisfying Gameplay: Create, Grow, and Lead!

Experience the strangely satisfying thrill of watching your mob multiply as you aim and shoot at the gates. Witness your army grow to massive proportions!
Strategically deploy your mighty Champions to break through enemy mobs and reach their bases. Choose the best combo for victory!
Explore intriguing level elements like speed boosts, multipliers, moving gates, and more, adding depth and challenge to your gameplay.

Become an Immortal Player: Rise Through the Ranks!

Earn Championship Stars by emerging victorious in battles, fortifying your bases, and dominating tournaments. Show the world your tower defense prowess!

Climb the prestigious Champions League using your hard-earned Championship Stars and become an immortal player, joining the elite few who have conquered this tower defense realm.

Fortify Your Base: Shield Your Dominion!

Secure your base from enemy raids by winning battles and earning valuable shields. Protect your hard-earned resources and maintain your tower defense dominance.

Unlock and Upgrade Cards: Collect, Evolve, and Dominate!

Win battles to unlock booster packs of varying rarities and enhance your card collection. Collectible cards hold the power to elevate your tower defense strategy to new heights.

Unlock all the Cannons, Mobs and Champions in the armory and discover their amazing evolutions as you level them up.

Diverse Game Modes: Challenge and Conquer!

Engage in thrilling game modes that keep the action fresh:
Base Invasion: Raid enemy strongholds, pilfer coins, and claim bricks from rival players. Plunder and dominate!

Revenge and Counter-Attack: Turn the tables on attackers and seek retribution against those who challenge your tower defense might.

Boss Levels: Test your tower defense mettle in unique level layouts, earning extra bonuses as you conquer the most challenging adversaries.

Season Pass: A Constant Stream of Fresh Content!

Dive into ever-evolving content with our monthly Season Pass.
Complete quests, advance tiers, and unlock new heroes, cannons and skins

Always Improving: Join the Evolution!

Our dedicated team is committed to delivering fresh mechanics and content every month. Stay connected and share your ideas via Settings > Discord, actively contributing to the evolution of Mob Control.

A Premium Experience: Your Choice to Play Ad-Free!

Mob Control is free to download and utilizes ads to support ongoing development. Opt for the Premium Pass or a permanent no-ads package to enjoy uninterrupted tower defense action.
Speed up your progress and reap extra rewards without watching ads, thanks to Skipâ€™Its.

Support and Privacy: Your Satisfaction Matters! Connect with us in-game via Settings > Help and Support whenever you need assistance or have questions. Your privacy is crucial to us. Review our comprehensive privacy policy at https://www.voodoo.io/privacy

Join the tower defense clash like never before with Mob Control! Rally your army, harness the power of collectible cards, and become the tower defense champion you were born to be. Download now and embark on your journey to tower defense glory!

title: Bomber Friends
summary:
Place a bomb and hide behind a corner. BOOM! Did you blast the opponent or did they escape? Try again! Collect powerups from the map to get more powerful bombs! Watch out for evil curses!

You can enjoy Bomber Friends in both online Multiplayer and Single Player modes. Which Bomber mode do you like more?

Single Player features:
- Orcs have attacked the Bomber Village and you need to guide our Bomber Hero through 6 different worlds full of devious monsters and mind boggling puzzles to save all his Bomber Friends!
- Single Player Campaign mode with over 300 levels!
- Five special Quest modes with more challenging levels and epic Boss Fights!
- Dungeon run modes for those who like to challenge their Bomber Skills even more!
- Daily Bounty hunts! Can you defeat all of the villains hiding in the Bomber World?

Multiplayer features:
- Bomb your opponents and be the last one standing to win the match!
- Compete in the online arenas and gain medals by winning. Climb up arena by arena until you reach the Leagues! Thatâ€™s where the highly skilled players match against each other in epic battles!
- Collect your own battle deck! Different cards give you different special bombs with (for example) bigger blast zones or shorter fuses, you can even call for an Air Strike or launch a Nuke!
- Face three opponents in the Arena free-for-all match. You can also play Duels one on one!
- Try out the immensely hectic King of the Hill where your team needs to capture the flag before the other team does!
- VS Friends Online Multiplayer for 2-8 players! Challenge your friends or play against random opponents. Play classic, team or reversi matches. Create a game room with your own settings and enable Ghost Mode to haunt other players as a ghost!
- Two weekly multiplayer events with exciting gimmicks, fascinating maps and awesome rewards! This is how you gain gold coins, gems, cards and new accessories for your Bomber!

Customize your Bomber!
- Customize your character with cool hats, suits, accessories and bombs
- Use taunts and greetings in the matches
- Choose a special gravestone and go out in style!
- Send customize items as gifts to other players. Make a Wish list to let your friends know which items you want to get!
- Take part in the Fashion Show and collect Fashion tokens. Use the tokens to get new clothes and skins from Bomber Gacha. Even Legendary items!

Monthly updates!
- New Season starts on the first Tuesday of every month
- Each Season has a Theme with Seasonal Rewards. Play daily to collect them all! More rewards with Bomber Battle Pass!
- Weekly events related to the Season theme!
- New Outfit Bundles available every week of the Season!
- Seasonal leader boards for best players and best clans!

And thereâ€™s more!
- Classic Bomber style gameplay, with controls polished for touchscreen!
- Complete Daily Tasks to get rewards
- Put your luck to the test and spin Bomber Wheel
- Join a Clan or create your own. Invite other players to join your clan. Work together to get a weekly Clan Chest.
- Universal game controller support.
- Introducing Bomber Journal in 2024

Get Bomber Friends now and join the fun online multiplayer game! Have a blast!

*Important message: This game includes in-app purchases. You can set up password verification for in-app purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app.*

title: Truck Simulator : Ultimate
summary:
ğŸšš Truck Simulator ğŸšš

Official Mercedes-Benz, Scania and DAF licensed trucks are waiting for you.

With officially licensed Michelin tires, trucks conquer even the toughest roads!

From the producers of Bus Simulator : Ultimate, played by more than 350+ million players, brand new game Truck Simulator : Ultimate.

Completely realistic missions and Euro Truck Simulator and American Truck Simulator experience are waiting for you.

New Jobs: Fashion Shopping Online, Gas and Fuel, Fusion, Fridge, Money, Food Delivery, Gem Stack, Office Supplies, Frozen Honey, Theme Park Materials, Cars and more fun Jobs.

Simulation and Tycoon combined in one game for the first time in the world.

Establish your company, hire employees, expand your fleet. Become the king of the roads as you travel the world from one end to the other. ğŸšš

ğŸ’¡Minimum system requirements

ğŸ•¹ï¸System requirements for Truck Simulator : Ultimate: Android 7.0 or higher and at least 2GB memory. Players using other devices can try playing the game at low settings.

Establish your company in the world's leading countries such as the United States, China, Canada, Russia, Germany, Italy, France, Spain, Netherlands, Turkey, South Korea, Japan, Brazil, Azerbaijan and become the world's largest logistics company.

Truck Simulator Game Features

- DLC mods system
- Multiplayer season. You can either carry joint cargo or participate in races. A brand new multiplayer experience awaits you.
- Transport a wide variety of cargo in over 100 cities
- Participate in auctions on the freight stocks and earn higher profits
- Manage your own business
- Build your own truck fleet
- Hire employees and manage your company for maximum profit
- Design your offices the way you want
- Find and Pay for Cheap Gas and Fuel (new features)
- Update your trucks with lamps, Bumper, horn, cockpit lights and more modification options
- 42+ Amazing Trucks
- Play with American Trucks and European Trucks
- Used Trucks Market
- Detailed Cockpits
- Rest areas. You can now order food and beverages at the rest areas.
- More than 25 language support
- More than 250 radio stations
- Highway Toll roads
- Realistic Weather
- Village, City, Highway roads

More features will continue to be added!

title: Avakin Life - 3D Virtual World

title: Pro League Soccer
summary:
Pro League Soccer

Select and upgrade your club!
After tough weeks, advance from the lower leagues to the upper leagues. Every season, join the league's national club cup and After a good season, get the chance to appear in the league of stars!

Become the king of the continent with your national team!
Join the league of nations and combat for the cup. Also, take part in many cups with play-offs and show yourself!

Gameplay:
Provide 360-degree flexibility of movement with fluent controls and character physics. Feel the reality with directional passes and shots.

Ball Control:
Throw curvilinear shots with improved ball physics. Provide instant ball control and shots with accurate timings.

Artificial intelligence:
Play against compeller and tiring, realistic Artificial intelligence modes. Fight opponents who are constantly looking for your deficit and looking for opportunity.

Edit All Data:
You can edit all Competition, Team and Player names in the game according to your preference. You can also load unique to yourself logos for teams from the internet.

title: Slugterra: Slug it Out 2
summary:
Slugterra: Slug It Out 2 â€“ Battle, Collect & Evolve

Collect, evolve, and battle in the official Slugterra game. Build your slug army, master elemental powers, and fight through fast, tactical match-3 battles with RPG strategy. Based on the hit Slugterra TV show, this action puzzle RPG lets you collect 100+ slugs, create powerful combos, and conquer the 99 Caverns.

100+ Slugs to Collect and Upgrade

Hunt down rare and powerful slugs with unique elemental abilities: Fire, Water, Earth, Air, Energy, and Psychic. Level them up, evolve favorites, and unlock legendary skills. Create a team that fits your playstyle, from high-damage openers to defensive counters and control.

Match-3 Battles with RPG Strategy

Solve match-3 puzzles to charge your slugs, then unleash devastating attacks. Chain tiles for bigger energy, time your abilities, and combine elements for bonus effects. Easy to start, deep to master. Every battle rewards smart planning and team synergy.

Adventure Through the 99 Caverns

Explore the underground world of Slugterra. Face iconic villains like Dr. Blakk and the Shadow Clan, clear story missions, and uncover treasures. Earn resources to power up slugs, craft better loadouts, and push deeper into new zones.

Multiplayer, PvP, and Live Events

Climb the ranks in competitive PvP and prove you are the ultimate Slugslinger. Play daily challenges and limited-time events to earn exclusive rewards, rare slugs, and upgrade materials. Return often for seasonal content and new ways to play.

Build the Ultimate Slugslinger Loadout

Mix elements to counter enemies, stack buffs and debuffs, and discover team comps that dominate. Swap slugs for different modes, tune your opener, and optimize for PvE or PvP. Mastery matters in this battle RPG.

Regular Updates and New Content

New slugs, events, modes, and quality-of-life improvements are added regularly to keep battles fresh. Check the in-game news for live events, balance updates, and limited-time rewards.

Why Players Love Slug It Out 2

- Official Slugterra world and characters
- Monster collecting meets action puzzle gameplay
- Strategic match-3 combat with real build depth
- Competitive multiplayer and rewarding events
- A growing roster of slugs to discover and evolve

Play Your Way

Whether you are here for story missions, daily challenges, or ranked PvP, Slugterra: Slug It Out 2 delivers a complete battle game experience with collectible depth and match-3 strategy. Perfect for fans searching for a Slugterra game, slug battle RPG, or a monster collecting puzzle game.

Download Slugterra: Slug It Out 2 and start your slug-slinging journey. Collect, battle, and become the greatest Slugslinger in the 99 Caverns.

title: OSM 26 - Football Manager game
summary:
Experience the exhilaration of leading your beloved football team to victory in this brand new season of Online Soccer Manager, the ultimate free-to-play soccer game that boasts authentic leagues, clubs, and players from around the globe.

Embark on your journey as a football manager by aligning with your preferred club, whether it's in Serie A, Premier League, Primera Division, or any global league. Assume command of prestigious clubs like Real Madrid, FC Barcelona, or Liverpool FC and lead them to glory on the virtual pitch.

As the head coach, you have the power to shape your team's destiny. Manage player transfers, scouting, training, and stadium expansion to ensure your team excels and achieves its goals on the football field. Customize your ideal formation and line-up to suit your playing style, and employ a diverse array of tactics to outwit your opponents.

Navigate player transfers with ease using the advanced transfer list feature, and scout promising talents or established superstars to strengthen your squad. Train and develop your players' skills to unlock their full potential, and engage in endless friendly matches to refine your strategies and elevate your team's performance in football games.

Expand your stadium to increase revenue and enhance facilities, and experience heart-pounding match simulations with the Match Experience feature. Showcase your managerial prowess globally by conquering the World Map, and challenge friends in the same league to establish your dominance on the football pitch.

Compete in thrilling football matches against managers worldwide, striving to become a legendary superstar in the vibrant community of over 50 million players who are passionate about football games. With OSM available in 30 languages, you can immerse yourself in the excitement of football management no matter where you are.

title: Carrom Pool: Disc Game
summary:
Carrom is an easy-to-play multiplayer board game. Pot all your pieces before your opponent. Can you become the best at this Carrom Board game ?

With simple gameplay, smooth controls, and great physics, travel around the world, and play against worthy opponents. Are you up for the challenge?

Customize your pieces with a huge variety of unlockable items! Show off your style to players from all over the world!

Features:
â–º Play a brand new 2v2 game mode. Play classic 4 player carrom matches with your family and friends
â–º Enjoy voice and video chat while playing a match. This feature is accessible to Carrom Pass owners only
â–º Try your luck at opening the lucky box. Get a free attempt on a daily basis and see how many free rewards you can unlock.
â–º Weekly new time-limited events that will keep you hooked. Play more to win more.
â–º Spin the wheel and unlock premium strikers, pucks, and much more
â–ºPlay multiplayer matches in 3 game modes: Carrom, Free Style and Disc Pool .
â–ºPlay with your friends .
â–ºCompete with top players.
â–ºTry your luck at free daily golden shot and win big prizes.
â–ºPlay around the world in glorious arenas .
â–º Smooth controls and realistic physics.
â–ºUnlock a wide range of strikers and pucks.
â–ºWin free victory chests with exciting rewards.
â–ºUpgrade your strikers and unleash frenzy.
â–ºSupports offline play .

Challenge your friends in one-on-one matches and show what you are worth!

title: Mini Militia Classic : DA2 MMC
summary:
Mini Militia (Classic) back by popular demand and under original management, Appsomniacs has re-launched the "Classic" version of Mini Militia Doodle Army 2 (DA2) featuring the return of wifi LAN play modes!

*The Miniclip version will remain in the store for those who enjoy it. Appsomniacs retains no creative control over the aforementioned version, but we do benefit from its continued success. Thanks for your patience as we take a step back and regroup and rally around our classic offering, and as a base of operations to launch our new initiatives with the Doodle Army Franchise including advancing this classic version in a new, but very familiar, direction.

In the words of Sarge "We ain't got time to be dead."

Experience intense multiplayer combat with up to 6 players online or 12 using local wi-fi. Train with the Sarge and sharpen your skills in offline Training, Co-op and Survival modes. Shoot a multitude of weapon types including the sniper, shotgun and flamethrower.

Features explosive online and local multiplayer warfare! Intuitive dual stick shooting controls. Open world maps utilizing rocket boots for extended vertical flight. Zoom control, melee attacks and dual wield ability with modern and futuristic heavy duty weapons and grenades. Play team based battles in this fun cartoon themed cross between Soldat and Halo.

Mini Militia Classic : Doodle Army 2 aka MMC, is the spiritual rebirth to the original DA2 which was , sequel to the stickman shooter Doodle Army, was created based on player feedback and suggestions. We love to hear your ideas so thank you and keep them coming! Our alpha testers toiled for years to bring back elements that were removed (e.g., LAN, CTF, etc.) in the original DA2 as it evolved. MMC will evolve too, but not at a cost of those treasured features. This will be the launching point for future endeavors in the Mini Militia evolving multiverse.
